bibl.title: Athenian Studies Presented to W.S. Ferguson
bibl.note: 1. The Hellenica of Oxyrhynchus and Its Authorship. - 2. Notes on the Atthis of Androtion. - 3. Theophrastus' Nomoi and Aristotle.
